name: Ihor Kozar
description: Ihor devours mobile development with a passion that's contagious. This fast-learning whiz speaks fluent code and an even better human, making complex concepts clear for everyone. Ihor's a powerhouse when it comes to building beautiful, functional mobile apps. Need a rockstar to craft your next mobile masterpiece? Ihor's your guy.
shortDescription: Ihor devours mobile development with a passion that's contagious. This fast-learning whiz speaks fluent code and an even better human, making complex concepts clear for everyone.
